properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 3 at 2:00PM PST until January 5 at 9:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 9 to 13 feet at 13 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...From 3 PM Saturday to 9 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM PST SUNDAY
